name: PHP Symfony Developer
description:
A software development and marketing agency with HQ in Dubai is looking for a responsible and creative Backend Symfony developer.

The company develops custom, complex and scalable solutions for high-load e-comm projects.

Launched by an ex-Google software engineer and a graduate from the American University of science the company celebrates its 10th birthday in 2021 marking a decade of successful work while doubling its team size.

Spread across 9 countries, the company takes pride in its inclusivity and employees, some of the best talents in the world.

You’ll be working in an environment that will require and support your growth as a software engineer specialized in web technologies. You’ll be using your engineering skills to advance well thought out solutions that you will develop and deploy to production, surrounded by our technical team.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop & implement backend software solutions using the Symfony 3.4+ framework;

  • Ensure a high-quality standard of our codebase for future expansions & maintainability;

  • Work as part of a development team to plan software solutions & bring projects to completion;

  • Understand our business needs to make sure you’re addressing them properly;

  • Collaborate with the technical project manager to develop your own project timelines;

  • Collaborate with the frontend and creative teams to ensure proper implementation of their vision;

  • Collaborate with the marketing department to provide the necessary data they need to optimize their work.

Requirements:

We’re looking for candidates who have extensive experience with:

  • The Symfony PHP Framework (3.4 or 4.4), and its various components;

  • Symfony's community ecosystem and bundles;

  • Building performant websites and web applications from scratch;

  • Using popular data structures and design patterns properly.

As well as considerable experience with:

  • MySQL;

  • Web API development;

  • PHPUnit;

  • Ubuntu, and the CLI environment;

  • Git.

Nice-to-have:

None of this is required but we will be impressed if you have experience in:

  • Google Cloud Platform;

  • Writing semantic HTML;

  • Vanilla Javascript;

  • SCSS.

Conditions:

  • Fully remote work;

  • 26 paid leaves + end of year company holidays (usually 12 to 14 days). Sick leave, maternity and parental leave, bereavement leave, honeymoon leave;

  • Yearly company treats when we fly everyone to a location for a week to meet in person (when no COVID);

  • Full insurance payments up to $2000 a year;

  • Paid trainings & conferences;

  • Yearly performance review with 3-10% salary increase + bonus.
